Characters.Name: Faith Phillips
Characters.Intro: My name is Faith Phillips and I am Michael's mother. I've already talked to my husband, and my lawyers are on the way.
Characters.Accusation: Are you serious? When my lawyers find you, you'll wish you were the one that was murdered.

KnownClues.Dialogue: We were driving back from one of my husband's political rallies when we decided to stop for the night. I thought everyone was asleep. We just woke up when you arrived.
I threw it out. What kind of investigator asks about trash when my son is dead?
He probably took it with him when he left the room. They only gave us one key.
That's my son's. He always has it with him.
What is that? I've never seen anything like that.
Michael was a good boy. Only his father smokes and he never does it around the children.
We just checked in. The receptionist had me sign that.
That's my purse! Fine. My husband has been receiving a lot of death threats recently.
I've never seen that before. This has to be some sick joke. Someone paid $10,000 to kill my son.
If you have a camera, then you should be able to see who killed my son!
What does a candy wrapper have to do with my son? Do your job!
It was not an altercation. The receptionist wouldn't let me have any rooms. She was forcing me into this one.

Characters.Name: Christopher Phillips
Characters.Intro: My name is Christopher. Where is my brother?

KnownClues.Dialogue: I saw Michael leave. I think he wanted to talk to the desk girl. Then the garbage man yelled at the naked lady.

Characters.Name: Richard Wright
Characters.Intro: My name is Richard Wright. I'm the housekeeper and maintenance technician for the motel.
Characters.Accusation: Look, I know the cliche. But I'm telling you I didn't kill that kid. I wouldn't hurt a fly, please!

KnownClues.Dialogue: We had a large pipe burst rendering half the motel unusable. I was cleaning up some of that mess around the time they arrived. I did see not long after there was a black car that seemed like it was circling around.
I was going to look into it but then I saw the mother arguing with Nancy over the rooms. She wouldn't take no for an answer when we told her some of them were closed.
She was just another rude guest, happens all the time. I don't think she would have done anything. I talked to Nancy and she said wasn't really bothered by it.
I was in the maintenance room when the boy, Michael, passed by. He dropped his ID, so I went to return it to him.
Probably from the vending machine. Only me and Nancy can get in there and there shouldn't have been anything wrong with the candy in the machine.
Oh this, it was a birthday present from my wife. 40 years and I've spent 15 of them with her.
Yeah, I used to smoke, but I've been trying to use that instead. It's supposed to be better for you I guess.
No, I've got my chew and Nancy doesn't smoke at all. I think that hobo Paul might.
No, I don't typically need something like that for my work. I'd bet Paul or Cherry uses them for drugs.
That's the guest book, it's how guests check in to their rooms. As far as I know, only Nancy would have access to that.
Looks like Cherry's hair. I'm honestly not sure if it's real or fake.

Yes, we knew about her past. It was a whole ordeal with her boyfriend. Nancy is a good worker, she's never been rude or stolen from the motel. If it weren't for the tattoo, I wouldn't even believe she was in a gang.

Yes, we knew about her past. It was a whole ordeal with her boyfriend. Nancy is a good worker, she's never been rude or stolen from the motel. If it weren't for the tattoo, I wouldn't even believe she was in a gang.
I'm not sure how that happened. the mother and her argued, but there was no fight.
I promise, I have never seen that note before. I understand it's covered in dirt, but I've been dealing with burst pipes. My hands are clean. It has to be someone else.
We only have the one camera, in case something happens. From what I heard, all it shows is that Michael left his room alone.

Characters.Name: Nancy Reed
Characters.Intro: My name is Nancy Reed, and I'm the receptionist for the motel.
Characters.Accusation: I know that I've had a rough past, but I haven't been that person for a long time. You're making a mistake!

KnownClues.Dialogue: I was just going about my normal business when a family came to check in. The mother was extremely rude when I told her most of the rooms were closed due to a pipe burst. Later, the... victim came down. He was clearly flirting, but I turned him down and he left.
She was upset that the rooms were closed. Voices were raised, but she eventually calmed down.

I'm not the best when it comes to relationships, so I turned him down. After that is a bit blurry. Cherry showed up. She's not allowed in the motel for obvious reasons so I told her to leave and then... I don't remember. Did I fall asleep?
We have two for each room, just in case someone loses it or steals it. They're locked inside this drawer and only me and Richard would be able to get into them. All but that one are accounted for.
That looks like it's from our vending machine. As long as no one tries breaking the vending machine, me and Richard just refill it from time to time.
Oh yeah, he said it was a gift or something. He's had it for a little while now.
That's probably Richard's, he said he wanted to try that instead of smoking.
I don't smoke, and Richard has been using chewing stuff.
Oh god no. The only person I could imagine needing something like that is a drug addict.
Yeah, that's what I use to check guests into their rooms. Only I use it, but... I remember Cherry asking about it. I don't know why.
No, it's probably from Cherry. She sheds all over the place.
I… I really don't remember well. Cherry came in and then I woke up to cops.
Um… yeah. I used to date a guy who was part of a gang and one night I got really drunk and ended up with a tattoo. I'm not part of any gang, and I definitely regret getting it.
I have never seen that before and it's covered in mud. I keep my hands clean, it can't be mine.
I have never seen that note before. But it's covered in red lipstick like Cherry wears.
We only have one camera and all I could find is that he left the room late last night.

Characters.Name: Cherry
Characters.Intro: Mary Ross, but my friends call me Cherry.
Characters.Accusation: I didn't kill the damn kid. I can't go to jail, I won't last!

KnownClues.Dialogue: I didn't see a thing. I was just leaving when you got here.
No sugar, you can't have candy and keep up this kind of figure.
No honey, I don't play with sharp objects.
Normally, a girl wouldn't tell secrets, but Paul and that housekeeper fella had a smoke together.
I can't say that I do. I'm not usually the one whose name is in the guest book.
Like I said, I had just come in and was just leaving.
Ok fine. Some creep in a black car came by and offered me money to give them that guest book. But I swear I didn't kill the kid.
It was plain, I never saw who was inside. The money is already gone.
Ok yeah, she wouldn't even give me a chance to talk. I pushed her and she hit her head. I didn't mean to hurt her.
Ew, gross, that's covered in dirt. Sweetie, if my hands were that dirty, I'd be out of a job.

Characters.Name: Paul Butler
Characters.Intro: I'm Paul. I sleep on the sidewalk out there.
Characters.Accusation: I didn't do it. You have to believe me!

KnownClues.Dialogue: I didn't see anything. I was just looking to see if anyone threw away any food.
I don't have much money to use a vending machine.
I don't do any drugs, if that's what you're asking.
Uh, well, I do smoke, but only if I can get my hands on a pack. The maintenance man gave me one when he came out for a break.
No, that's a bit too rich for me.
I have never seen that before. I don't know what you're talking about.
I don't know nothing about that, but I heard Cherry say something about it.
Someone in a black car gave that to Cherry. But I don't know anything else about it.
